reviews.text: This hotel is a motel. You have your own entrance from the outside and you must walk the property to get anywhere. Parking is outside your door and there is no elevator.
reviews.title: Not a 3 star rating

reviews.text: This property is a good cost for the budget, but we experienced many problems, which I must admit the hotel/motel manager took care of for us right away.
reviews.title: Decent Family Stay

reviews.text: This site needs a total remake, which I gather is in the process. The rooms were run- down and lacked good housekeeping. Buy the breakfast with your package, because it is a good deal and the buffett was nice.
reviews.title: good with kids

reviews.text: Shuttle service is limited.
reviews.title: Would stay here again

reviews.text: Our family rates this hotel/motel a 2 star.
reviews.title: Good family hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a fortnight at the Best Western Lakeside in Kissimmee. The accommodation was spacious, roomy and brightly decorated. The room comprised a safe, fridge, A/C which is all payable with the resort fee of $49 for two weeks. The room felt safe and secure as did the whole of the motel complex. As it is such a large resort, there always seemed to be someone coming or going! Excellent direct service to Busch Gardens from just outside the lobby doors, (free to those with flexplus tickets).
reviews.title: Fantastic stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms cleaned to a very high standard, though we did realise second from last day of the holiday we had been rather over generous with the tipping! The walkways contained ice vending machines, and drink machines. Hurricane Sam's restaurant served a selection of dishes as well as Pizza Hut. In addition, the bar area has a pool table and touch screen quiz style machines on the bar.
reviews.title: Great place for Disney Vacation

reviews.text: The service was good from the staff, and the 50ft buffet Breakfast was always popular. We enjoyed two games on mini golf, which again is already paid for with the resort charge. Whilst not being the newest mini golf in the area, it was still fun, challenging (to some more than others!!!!!) and kind of charming!
reviews.title: Thank you for a wonderful stay

likes.disliked: — shower splashed on floor a bit , fridge was too small

reviews.text: The on site shop was good with a selection of fuits, pre packed salads, sweets and snacks available. The poolside bars do delicious frozen Pina Coladas also!!!
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All round enjoyable stay at the best Western Lakseide. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again, and would recommend to families and friends! Location wise, around 25 mins to Universal and much closer to Disney. The motel is Situated off a busy road, the 192, which contains an abundance of 'themed' tourist shops, restaurants, and breakfast bars, Bob Evans being a fav!
reviews.title: Excellent value!

reviews.text: I stayed here with my son in 2006 and loved it so we came back this year and loved it just as much! It is an excellent location for disney - no need to hire a car as the complimentary shuttles are great, they are modern, clean, comfortable and on time. Disney is literally no more than 10 minutes away and if you want to stay after 11 a taxi is an average of $14-18. There is a walgreens next to the hotel which has most things you need and there are several restaurants nearby - TGI fridays is 100 time better in the USA than it is in the UK - the food was fab! The rooms are big, clean and comfortable and the staff are really helpful - any time day or night you can ring for towels, pillows etc and they bring them to you within minutes. There is a laundry near the pool which is really handy and the pools are heated so you can swim at night. I would go there again and again, I love Disney - universal has some great rides nut it'll never compete with Disney's magic!
reviews.title: Great again!

likes.disliked: — You probably need a car to just nip out to locations other than parks

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 3 weeks. There were two adults, two children and a baby. It was fantastic and we would really recommend this hotel. Staff were great, we had no complaints and we stayed for 21 nights! Its great having a 24 hour walgreens, just over the carpark. So handy for the parks too.
reviews.title: Great place
Best western lakside was ok
reviews.text: We had the pool most of the time to ourselves! It was quite quiet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel staff went out of their way to help.
reviews.title: Cheap & Cheerful

reviews.text: We would certainly go again.
reviews.title: Once again...a great place for little money!
A Good Base, but.........
reviews.text: I stayed here the first two weeks of May 2008.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My first impressions were of disappointment as the room looked decidely dated and not at all what I expected from a "recently reburbished" hotel.
reviews.title: A relaxing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I wasn't in Orlando to sit in a hotel all day long though so this wasn't a major problem, and after a few days I started to feel fairly comfortable there.
reviews.title: We had a wonderful time!

reviews.text: Be warned that the rooms are VERY noisy (at least mine was). I stayed in an upper floor room in a building away from the pool and heard everything going on around me from people walking past, cars parking up outside, neighbouring rooms showers and toilets flushing and of course the sound of a very loud air conditioning unit: even if you turn yours off you'll still hear the air con from the surrounding rooms. EAR PLUGS ARE A MUST.
reviews.title: Convenient and Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you've been to the parks all day though the beds are comfy (ours was brand new as it was changed to a new one a day or two into the holiday) so you should be too tired to care and will no doubt fall asleep pretty quick (with ear plugs).
reviews.title: Basic Accommodations

likes.disliked: — Had to carry the luggage upstairs without an elevator! Rooms could have been maintained better
